title: "DirectX error" unable to connect to games
body: When I go into game it closes the window and shows me this (idk the full message but it goes along the lines of) "directX error, unable to connect..please check your manufacturer..." something like that. Then i keep trying to reconect and same message pops up. Whats going on?

replies.body:
Hi,

First stop, I'd check out the [Bug Splat and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) article on the support site.  Pay particular attention to updating your graphics drivers and directx.

If you continue to have problems after going through the steps there, the next best thing would be to lodge a support ticket, and they will be able to help you dig into the root cause of the issue.

Cheers
Mindstar
